title: The Shawshank Redemption
overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency

title: The Godfather
overview: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son Michael Corleone

title: The Dark Knight
overview: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham Batman must accept one of the greatest tests

title: Inception
overview: A skilled thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea

title: Pulp Fiction
overview: The lives of two mob hitmen a boxer a gangster and his wife and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence

title: Forrest Gump
overview: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75

title: The Matrix
overview: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers

title: Goodfellas
overview: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners in crime

title: The Silence of the Lambs
overview: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer who skins his victims

title: Se7en
overview: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives

title: Saving Private Ryan
overview: Following the Normandy Landings a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper

title: Schindler's List
overview: In German-occupied Poland during World War II industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce

title: Gladiator
overview: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery

title: The Green Mile
overview: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape yet who has a mysterious gift

title: Interstellar
overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival

title: The Usual Suspects
overview: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat as investigators try to figure out what really happened

title: L.A. Confidential
overview: As corrupted cops and criminals descend on 1950s Los Angeles to stake their claims of the plentiful opportunities available a private detective must sift through the carnage to uncover the truth

title: The Departed
overview: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston

title: Mystic River
overview: Clint Eastwood directs and stars in this tense drama about three childhood friends whose lives take a dark turn

title: The Prestige
overview: After a tragic accident two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything to outwit each other
